types.name: lsm9ds0/gyroscope
types.description: Gyroscope node for the lsm9ds0 chipset.

members.name: scale
members.description: Scale selection (in degrees per second). Must be one of 245, 500 or 2000. The scales ranges from -value to +value

in_ports.name: TICK
in_ports.description: Every time a packet is received in this port the node will read the sensor value and output it's data.

out_ports.name: OUT
out_ports.description: Gyroscope in all X/Y/Z axes, in a scale of degrees per second.

types.name: lsm9ds0/xmt
types.description: Accelerometer (X), Magnetometer (M) and Temperature (T) node for the lsm9ds0 chipset.

members.name: accel_scale
members.description: Scale selection (in factor of g). Must be one of 2, 4, 6, 8 or 16. The scales ranges from -value to +value

members.name: mag_scale
members.description: Scale selection (in gauss). Must be one of 2, 4, 8 or 12. The scales ranges from -value to +value

in_ports.name: TICK
in_ports.description: Every time a packet is received in this port the node will read the sensor value and output it's data.

out_ports.name: ACCEL
out_ports.description: Acceleration in all (X/Y/Z) axes, as g-force factor.

out_ports.name: MAG
out_ports.description: Magnetometer in all (X/Y/Z) axes, in gauss.
